document_data.name: Sunstrait
document_data.georefs: {{Cite polyhedron/64/The Everwinking Eye: Daily Life in Mulmaster|21}}
document_data.mainbody: The '''Sunstrait''' was the "mouth" that linked the [[Golden Water]] with the [[Great Sea]].
document_data.Geography: The Sunstrait was located in the [[Shining Lands]] of [[Southeast Faerûn]]. On the strait's western shores belonged to [[Var the Golden]] and the port-city of [[Myrmyr]] was built on its waters.
